speaker: The Archmage
lines: Touching the Weave blinds you again, sending you back into a deep slumber.
You wake up to find yourself in the archmage's study.
The archmage is standing in front of you, smiling.
He says you have been chosen to be the next archmage.
You are the most balanced mage in the world.
You have the power to bend the storm, the power to see the hidden name beneath all names, and the power to wield without ruin.
Take this as a sign of your mastery of the balance.
The archmage hands you a robe, the 'Archmage Robes'.

give_item.name: Archmage Robes
give_item.description: A suit of robes that protects you with the Weave
